45212952.review:
It has been a while since I played simulation game, 《[b]中国式家长[/b]》[b]Chinese Parents[/b] actually quite a good one. The game was about parenting, to raise your child 'Chinese Style', lol!

The game started with you as a new-born baby, ended after you finished high school. One playthrough takes about 2 hours more or less, some of the stats will be inherited to your next generation, so the replayability is there for you to try out different of life for your kid.

After spending 20 hours, 11 generations, overall fun game, the graphic is cute, UI is clean and easy to understand.
However, there are few things I wished to be improved.
• [i]Autoskip for weekly schedule. No more space bar or mouse spamming.[/i]
• [i]No female?[/i]
• [i]How exactly you play the [b]Essay-Writing[/b] minigame? The tutorial doesn't explain well. The 'Inspiration' that appears on the screen could stay a bit longer, it disappeared before you can read it.[/i]
• [i]For the [b]Specialty Contest[/b], I have no idea which one to choose.[/i]
• [i]Please put the school test date for each grade but not only high school.[/i]
• [i]You can only chat with girls using handphone, no other activities? That's boring.[/i]
• [i]The money you get from working, helping your parents cost too much energy, and too little money in return, not worth it.[/i]

Anyway, good game and hope to see many more great games from you guys in the future!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

已有一段时间了吧，能玩到如此有趣的人生模拟游戏。 《[b]中国式家长[/b]》是一款以养育孩子为主的模拟游戏，中国式的。

游戏开始于你为一个新生婴儿，游戏在完成高中后结束。完成一代大概需要两小时左右吧。天赋属性都会继承到下一代，这让游戏增加了可玩性，也可以让你尝试养育出更杰出或不一样的下一代。

肝了二十小时（皮肤湿疹都复发了！），十一代之后的感想，总体来说还不错，画面啊，UI啊都很不错。音乐都喜欢。
但有一些希望能改进。
• 日程安排希望能自动快速跳过，连按键盘或滑鼠太累了。
• 怎么没女生啊？
• 这写作怎玩的？拼命按灵感而已吗？灵感也消失得太快了吧。
• 中国有人才只是选个最稀有的特长？
• 除了高考提示外，其他考试也提示出来吧，好让玩家提前购买学习路径。
• 只能使用手机泡妞？增加其他活动吧。
• 打工赚来的钱太少了。

希望你们制作出更多更棒更有趣的游戏！加油！

45175754.review:
不要购买！不要购买！不要购买！

TL;DR：
如果是看到和《太吾》捆绑营销的文章跑来买的，千万不要买。

《家长》的制作水平≤二流免费手游，而且这是正式版，不会有大改进了。

去玩《众生》，也是国产写实，从出生开始成长，水平远在其上。

《家长》就是靠营销，请把钱留给真正有梦想的游戏人，不要因为”情怀“送给营销狗。



因为网上有文章和《太吾绘卷》相提并论所以买来玩。即使考虑到价格，也完全完全不是一个档次。

推荐去尝试一下《众生》，看看真正靠梦想支撑，低成本制作，国产写实游戏可以达到的高度，再回来看《中国式家长》，会发现《家长》真的靠的就是营销，尤其是和《太吾》的捆绑营销。

很多人都说了，玩法非常单一，一个类似消消乐的小游戏贯穿每代人两三个小时的游戏时间。各个系统非常薄弱，一直以为是beta，后来发现这就是正式版，可见制作室也是准备捞一笔就走，没想继续深入开发的。举个小例子，《太吾》的代码有多乱重构有多难大家是知道的，但是《太吾》9月21号发布，7天后就完全重做了道具排序，而《家长》29号发布，整个国庆假期营销倒是没闲着，到现在一个保留录取通知书的页面都没做出来。

知乎上问《太吾绘卷》有没有过誉，不知道，但是《家长》绝对是过誉了。一个二流免费手游水平的游戏，被捧到热销第一，完全就是把多年来国产游戏重营销轻体验的商业打法，放到独立制作游戏里再捞一波。这一波热潮，是真正认真做游戏的茄子等人披荆斩棘得来的，请不要让打扮成情怀游戏人的营销狗，分走这一份胜利果实。请不要买《中国式家长》。



以下列一些实锤缺点：
1. 玩法单一，主体就是一个类似消消乐的小游戏，其他各种游戏功能也都以单薄的小游戏形式呈现。世代之间游戏体验差别非常小。

2. 号称世代传承，但是其实制作组完全没在这个上面放心思。所有新手指引在第二代都保留。打二周目跳过已读这种标准操作都懒得做，可见制作组压根没指望大多数人玩很多世代。很多人抱怨的没有收集录取通知书页面的问题，也来自于这个心态。

3. 40条玩家征集的随机事件：这种事情也好意思宣传？40条是多少？一张A4纸正反面而已。加上美工也就是两张A4纸。两张纸的内容却是重要feature，《家长》的情怀，也就两张纸那么薄了。

4. 美工音乐我就不说了。HD都做不到，满屏锯齿。

45133045.review:
**Note, this review was done with me completing the game with some guessing on the translations.

For English speakers, my own alternative (satirical) translation for this game is "Tiger Mom Simulator"

The goal of this game is to guide you (or your child) from toddler all the way up to their college entrance exam (高考).

Character growth and development is based on some RNG generated clickable squares to increase primary stats 
Intelligence 智商
Empathy 情商
Athletics 体
Memory
Imagination/Creativity
Endurance,
Face (MianZi)
"Learning Points" (The Light bulb) to develop specific activities to improve those primary stats.

The system mentioned above makes this game have an interesting concept to ensure your little child never grows up the same way as any other playthroughs (or previous generations! New game+ basically offers you small stat boosts to sucessive generations).

There are also 3 stats that affect the status of your child.
1. Stress
2. Parental Approval (for the filial child)
3. Self-esteem / mental wellbeing.

Too much stress can and will crush your child's well-being.
Too much parental disapproval can and will crush your child's well-being.
Your child commits suicide when their self-esteem/mental well being goes over the threshhold*.

*I literally did not notice that on my first playthrough and my child commited suicide in high school year 1 after non-stop school activities and 0 recreational activities.

Some other topics of interest -

Saving Face (Miànzi)
Red packets of money (How to receive it, lest your parents takes it from you for themselves)
An unrealistic mini dating sim is also included (7 girls are included as of this writing)

The Chinese social environment is far more complex than in the what is understood in the US (As I consider the US social norms to be more "transactional" and until recently, less deceitful).

Overall, 

'Chinese Parents' is a very interesting cultural sim game - I highly recommended for any players interested in modern Chinese culture. 

Final score: 8/10

45014676.review:
I recommand this game because it is a good SLG, and it is pretty fun for someone who really enjoys SLG type of game.

However, I don't like the idea that the game is trying to express, all you are doing in this game is about [b]climbing the social ladder[/b] and all the meaning of your life is leveling all kind of "index" and marry a wife with "good" gene so you can pass it to the next generation, which is pretty rediculous because genetic theory just doesn't work like that, and the idea of [b]"choosing a wife with good gene to reproduce" really disgusts me[/b], we only use genetic selection on breeding animals, not on human.
What i am trying to say is:
Life is way more complex than the numbers you are leveling in this game and it can not be simply measured by how" successful" you are. 

Anyway, it is worth a try if you don't mind the political incorrectness .
Oh, don't forget that you need to be really good at Chinese to play this game.
